DOC.brief_summary: To compare bioavailability single 400 mg dose certolizumab pegol solution ( 2 x 200mg subcutaneous injection ) inject either pre-filled syringe ( reference ) auto-injection device ( test ) .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Bioequivalence Study : Pre-filled Syringe ( Reference ) Versus Auto-injection Device ( Test )
